name: The thing (itch)
description:
Do not let the light off completely bad things happen in the dark

You find yourself in a dark room With shadows dancing around you

If you open the door Something can jump on you
If you do not open the door, thing come for you
Would you survive until the morning

This game prototype
menu fix
door fix
Spider intelligence was improved but not enough
Monster prototype

CONTROLS

movement -Arrows
open door - mouse right click
light- right shift
